personas.name: Fletcher Moss 1
personas.description: Fletcher Moss, the namesake of Fletcher Moss Park in Didsbury, was a notable figure in the late 19th and early 20th centuries. Born on October 15, 1835, in Manchester, England, Fletcher Moss became well-known for his contributions as a philanthropist, amateur botanist, and local historian.
